Package org.actioncontroller.meta

Interface HttpParameterMapperFactory<ANNOTATION extends Annotation>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AnnotationFactory
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClientCertificate.MapperFactory, ContentBody.ParameterMapperFactory, ContextUrl.MapperFactory, HttpHeader.Mapper, JsonBody.MapperFactory, PathParam.MapperFactory, QueryString.ParameterMapperFactory, RequestParam.ClientIpParameterMapperFactory, RequestParam.MapperFactory, RequestParam.RemoteUserParameterMapperFactory, ServletUrl.MapperFactory, SessionParameter.MapperFactory, UnencryptedCookie.Factory, UnencryptedJsonCookie.MapperFactory, UserPrincipal.MapperFactory
    public interface HttpParameterMapperFactory<ANNOTATION extends Annotation>
extends AnnotationFactory
    Implementations of this interface should be annotated on annotations used to convert HTTP requests into method invocation arguments, such as RequestParam, PathParam and UnencryptedCookie

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      default HttpClientParameterMapper clientParameterMapper​(ANNOTATION annotation, Parameter parameter)
      Used by ApiClientClassProxy to convert method arguments into HTTP request information.
      HttpParameterMapper create​(ANNOTATION annotation, Parameter parameter, ApiControllerContext context)
      Create a mapper to convert a ApiHttpExchange into method call arguments.
      static HttpClientParameterMapper createClientMapper​(Type parameterType, BiConsumer<ApiClientExchange,​Object> exchangeWriter, BiFunction<ApiClientExchange,​Class<?>,​Optional<Object>> exchangeReader)
      Helper method for creating a HttpParameterMapper based on a parameterType that may be Consumer, AtomicReference or any other object.

    • Method Detail

      • createNewInstance

        static Optional<HttpClientParameterMapper> createNewClientInstance​(Parameter parameter)

      • createFactory

        static <T extends Annotation> HttpParameterMapperFactory<T> createFactory​(T annotation)

      • createMapper

        static HttpParameterMapper createMapper​(Type parameterType,
                                        BiFunction<ApiHttpExchange,​Class<?>,​Optional<Object>> getter,
                                        BiConsumer<ApiHttpExchange,​Object> setter,
                                        Supplier<Object> defaultValue)
        Helper method for creating a HttpParameterMapper based on a parameterType that may be Optional, Consumer, AtomicReference or any other object. Optionals are used to specify optional values, Consumers are used to specify values that should be returned from the action method and AtomicReference are used to specify values that should both be passed to the action method and returned to the client afterwards.
        Parameters:
        parameterType - May be Optional, Consumer, AtomicReference or other type
        getter - Will be called on entry unless parameterType is a Consumer
        setter - Will be called when request is complete for Consumer and AtomicReference
        defaultValue - If parameterType is not Optional and the getter returned Optional.empty, default value will be called to determine the value

      • createClientMapper

        static HttpClientParameterMapper createClientMapper​(Type parameterType,
                                                    BiConsumer<ApiClientExchange,​Object> exchangeWriter,
                                                    BiFunction<ApiClientExchange,​Class<?>,​Optional<Object>> exchangeReader)
        Helper method for creating a HttpParameterMapper based on a parameterType that may be Consumer, AtomicReference or any other object. Consumers are used to specify values that should be set after the request completes. AtomicReference are used to specify values that should both be passed to the request method and returned after the request completes.
        Parameters:
        parameterType - May be Optional, Consumer, AtomicReference or other type
        exchangeWriter - Will be called to populate the request
        exchangeReader - Will be called to retrieve values to Consumer or AtomicReference after request completes

      • create

        HttpParameterMapper create​(ANNOTATION annotation,
                           Parameter parameter,
                           ApiControllerContext context)
                    throws Exception
        Create a mapper to convert a ApiHttpExchange into method call arguments.
        Throws:
        Exception
